events.message: I just received my order and noticed the laptop screen has a large scratch. It looks like it was damaged before shipping.
The case has been categorized as a product defect due to the customer's report of a scratched and damaged screen on the laptop.
The support team member Sarah has been assigned to handle this case involving a faulty laptop screen.
Hello, I'm Sarah from customer support. I'm sorry to hear your laptop arrived with a scratched screen. Let's get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and your order number so I can verify the issue and proceed with a solution?
Here are the pictures of the scratched laptop screen along with a copy of my order confirmation email and receipt attached for your reference.
Thank you for the details. We can send you a replacement laptop immediately or arrange a repair. Please let me know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement laptop as soon as possible. Repair would take too long since I need it for work daily.
We have processed the replacement order for your laptop, which will be shipped within 24 hours with expedited shipping at no extra cost.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your replacement laptop and that it is in perfect condition. Please let us know if there are any further issues.
Yes, I received the replacement laptop yesterday and everything looks great this time. Thank you for the quick assistance!
We are happy to hear that your replacement laptop arrived in perfect condition. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey to hear about your experience with our support team. Your feedback is appreciated.
